title: Incident - Application Crashing
description: A user reports that a specific line-of-business application crashes every time they try to run a certain report.

tasks.description: Check the computer's event logs for application error details.
tasks.expected_outcome: The technician finds an application error event related to a corrupted file.

tasks.description: Attempt to repair the application's installation via the control panel.
tasks.expected_outcome: The repair process does not fix the issue.

tasks.description: Completely uninstall and then reinstall the application.
tasks.expected_outcome: Reinstalling the application resolves the corrupted file issue, and the report now runs successfully.
